author: Imperial13
title: the best. kinda.dotdot
review: Hello peoples! Dont buy this set ever. Buy the blue bird on a wire set it mixer comes with a motor and spins very fast. this set you have to wind up and it goes reeeeeeealyy slow. Not good. the coin bank and the other ones are great though! this set would've gotten a 4and a half!

author: Alemas
title: Let's whirl the washing-up liquid to make BUBBLES!
review:
Yeah, that's true: I used the main model(pictured here), to whirl a small glass of Persil to make bubbles... manually though. It works if I wound the motor up, but not much. Now though, it seems as if it doesn't work at all; when wound up, the motor works then stops a second later. It has many cool models though, including the smoothie-maker, a safe, and even a dice-roller! It also has a paddle; useful. Now, here are the pros and cons:

Pros:

Cool models
Nice smoothie-maker
Cool safe
Dicer-roller(NOT intended for poker, I guess)

Cons:

Motor is weak
Rubber bands are the old ones, which break easily

Overall, a great set!
